Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION
REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Bans paper receipts for certain purchases and requiring businesses to provide proof of purchase electronically
Summary: Bans paper receipts for certain purchases; requires businesses to provide proof of purchase electronically, unless a proof of purchase is otherwise required by state or federal law.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 16 §§27-1601 - 27-1607, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to banning paper receipts for certain purchases and requiring businesses to provide proof of purchases electronically
